TextView.android:text: USA: America may be the world's most influential country, but there is more to USA than influence and power. In fact, when it comes to nature, USA has the best of natural treasures. Alaska, for instance, has the world's well-preserved wildlife and Lake Tahoe has unparalleled clear waters and ski resorts. It cannot be denied that USA's prime spots have direct links to shopping malls, fast food joints, flashy billboards, and unbelievably busy people, but these traits add to the reasons why the USA is such an interesting country for both work and leisure.
